entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , North Perth
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow or freezing rain at times mixed with ice pellets beginning early in the morning. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023
